title: ESMA prioritises the fight against greenwashing in its new Sustainable Finance Roadmap - ESMA
content: ESMA prioritises the fight against greenwashing in its new Sustainable Finance Roadmap  ESMA
description: The European Securities and Markets Authority (ESMA), the EU’s securities markets regulator, has today published its Sustainable Finance Roadmap 2022-2024 (Roadmap). ESMA identifies three priorities for its sustainable finance work: Tackling greenwashing and promoting transparency; Building National Competent Authorities’ (NCAs) and ESMA’s capacities in the sustainable finance
